  • Increased Security
  • Predictable Revenue
  • Reliable Cashflow
Explore 100+ Integeration

Work Smarter.

Not Harder.

Accounting Integrations

No 3rd-party applications needed.
EBizCharge auto-pay works inside the tools
you already use.

Full or Partial Payments

Collect full or partial statement amounts at
the end of each billing cycle.
Explain Security

Accept and track nonprofit donations easily.

Your organization needs two things from their payment systems. First, you need to be able to take credit cards for nonprofit organizations, even if you don’t sell a physical product or service. In today’s economy, people make donations with credit cards, so they need a processing system. Second, you need to be able to track and document donations to keep their nonprofit status. Our nonprofit credit card services in Los Angeles do both and all in a platform that is easy to implement and learn. 

Secure system protects you and your donors.

Our payment solutions for nonprofits are technology-driven, including the latest security features. Donors deserve a secure system to use to donate to your cause. Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a secure environment for processing payments, ensuring you can take donations safely without compromising the security of your donor’s information. Through end-to-end encryption, tokenization, and PCI compliance, our credit card processing system protects your nonprofit.
